People's Daily People's Daily full text RSS. Get more full text RSS: https://feedx.net http://www.people.com.cn/ 01版要闻 - 为亚洲和国际奥林匹克运动发展作出新贡献http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/25/nw.D110000renmrb_20230925_1-01.htm
;Monday, September 25, 2023
; ;

;On the evening of September 23, the 19th Asian Games in Hangzhou grandly opened. President Xi Jinping attended the opening ceremony and announced the opening of this Asian Games, which triggered a warm response. Everyone expressed that they will go all out and strive for excellence to present to the world a sports event with "Chinese characteristics, Asian style, and excitement" and make new contributions to the development of the Asian and international Olympic movements.

;

; ;Present to the world a sports event with "Chinese characteristics, Asian style, and excitement";

;

;Under the strong leadership of the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping as the core Next, since the successful bid to host the Hangzhou Asian Games, Zhejiang has adhered to the concept of "green, smart, frugal and civilized", fully implemented the requirements of "simple, safe and exciting", and gone all out to strive for excellence and do a good job in all aspects. Preparatory work for all links of the chain.

;

;“We are very excited and encouraged when President Xi Jinping attended the opening ceremony of the Hangzhou Asian Games and announced the opening of this Asian Games.” Executive Secretary-General of the Hangzhou Asian Organizing Committee, Hangzhou Asian Games (Asian Paralympic Games) Chen Weiqiang, the main press spokesman, said, "We are confident to present to the world a sports event with 'Chinese characteristics, Asian style, and splendid'."

;

;"We must shoulder our mission and present a wonderful sports event to the world." Contribute to the games and make athletes from all over the country feel at home." Chang Shi, executive director of the Ningbo Asian Games Village Operations Team, said that the Asian Games Village, located in the Banbian Mountain Scenic Area, can accommodate nearly 500 athletes and team officials staying at the same time.

;

;“The Albano system used in this Asian Games is a channel system used in professional rowing and kayaking competitions. The timing accuracy of 1/1000 is absolutely perfect. The technological content of the Asian Games Getting higher and higher." Shen Xiaoliang, secretary-general of the Hangzhou Fuyang Aquatic Center Operations Team, said that from the 1990 Beijing Asian Games to the 2010 Guangzhou Asian Games, and then to this Hangzhou Asian Games, the passage of time has witnessed the continuous rise of my country's comprehensive national strength. Economic and social development has advanced by leaps and bounds.

;

;In the Modern City Community of Wenhui Street, Gongshu District, Hangzhou, many residents watched the live broadcast of the opening ceremony. "We feel very excited and proud." Community cadre Shao Lizing said, "We finally have the Asian Games at our doorstep. As citizens, we are honored to witness this moment and participate in it." From the Asian Games volunteer service booth to a picture From the Asian Games wall paintings to the special viewing spaces, the streets are filled with the atmosphere of the Asian Games.

;

;The preparation process for the Hangzhou Asian Games has once again demonstrated the institutional advantages of socialism in concentrating its efforts on major things.

;

;Chen Anwei, Chairman and Party Secretary of State Grid Zhejiang Electric Power, said that more than 18,000 power maintenance personnel of State Grid Zhejiang Electric Power stick to their posts and perform their duties diligently to ensure safe and reliable power supply during the Asian Games and help create the first carbon-neutral Asian Games. .

;

; ;The Asian Games carries the Asian people’s beautiful yearning for peace, unity, and tolerance;

;

;As the largest event held by our country after the victory of the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of my country, , the highest level international comprehensive sports event, the Hangzhou Asian Games has attracted much attention.

;

;“I was particularly impressed by the artistic use of lighting in the opening ceremony of the Hangzhou Asian Games.” Abadi Yaqub, a journalist from Saudi Arabia, said that the opening ceremony of the Hangzhou Asian Games combined Chinese traditional culture and modern technology Combined, it shows the unique Chinese historical architecture and Jiangnan scenery. While enjoying the visual feast, you can further deepen your understanding of traditional Chinese culture.

;

;The Asian Games carries the Asian people’s beautiful yearning for peace, unity and tolerance. The slogan of the Hangzhou Asian Games "Heart to heart, love for the future" is highly consistent with the Olympic motto of "Faster, Higher, Stronger - More United", embodying good wishes.

;

;The theme of the opening ceremony "Tide Asia" left a deep impression on people. Leng Song, chief writer of the opening ceremony of the Hangzhou Asian Games, introduced that water is the source of civilization. Hangzhou is a city born and prospered by water. The opening ceremony uses "tide" as the title and "water" as a link. Use the surging "tide" to show a credible, lovely and respectable image of China, and show the integration and excitement of China, Asia and the world in the new era.

;

;Professor Yuan Sha from the Central Conservatory of Music and Wang Zhouge, a post-90s actor from Zhejiang Xiaobaihua Yue Theater, participated in the opening ceremony of the "National Style and Elegant Rhythm" theatrical performance. Yuan Sha said: "I hope that the guzheng music I played can make people in Asia and the world feel the charm of China's excellent traditional culture." Wang Zhouge said: "Having the honor to participate in this Asian Games event is the pride of Yue opera actors in their art. Let us Full of cultural confidence."

;

;Walking in the streets and alleys of Hangzhou, the Asian Games mascot "Jiangnan Yi" can be seen everywhere and is very popular. Chinese and foreign tourists rush to buy souvenirs and take photos with it. Zhang Wen, the chief designer of the Asian Games mascot and a teacher at the China Academy of Art, said: "We hope to express our best wishes through the mascot and leave a beautiful cultural memory for the city."

;

;Asian Games It provides a stage for sports and culture to complement each other, and is a vivid portrayal of Asian culture that is eclectic, learns from others' strengths, and is full of vitality. The "Light of Civilization" from the ruins of Liangzhu Ancient City ignites the sports fire that symbolizes the unity of Asia. The long-standing Chinese civilization and the passionate sports event complement each other.

;

;At the opening ceremony, swimmer and Olympic champion Wang Shun, as the last torch bearer, lit up the "Qianjiang Tide" main torch tower together with the "digital torch bearers", and the Asian Games flames burned brightly. At that moment, his heart was surging and he could not calm down for a long time. Wang Shun said: "The Asian Games is not only a stage for competition, but also an important platform to promote peace, unity and tolerance. During the competition, we not only compete in strength but also enhance friendship with the athletes from each delegation."

;

;Zhang Zijing, a volunteer from Zhejiang Normal University, said that she was very honored to participate in this Asian Games as a "Little Green Lotus". "In the football match that has already started, the enthusiasm of the audience is very high, and the athletes are full of passion. After the athletes score, they say hello to the fans in the auditorium, bow and wave to everyone, and we also wave to the athletes. Everyone interacts in a friendly and enjoyable manner, which makes I feel the cultural integration and sincere friendship of the Asian Games family."

;

; ;With the responsibility of "the mission is on our shoulders and the struggle is mine", we will work hard, surpass ourselves, and win glory for the country

;

; ; strong>;

;

;As the largest comprehensive sports event in Asia, the Asian Games inspires sportsmanship, showcases Asian style, promotes friendship and unity, and continuously improves the level of competitive sports in Asia. The registration scale and number of events for this Asian Games have reached a record high, demonstrating the Asian people's eager expectation and firm support for the Hangzhou Asian Games.

;

;The Asian Games is a stage for sports competition and a platform for athletes to strive hard and break through themselves.

;

;Table tennis player and Olympic champion Sun Yingsha took the oath as one of the athlete representatives at the opening ceremony. She was extremely excited. "I feel proud to be born in such a great country and grow up in the best of times." Sun Yingsha said, "We must vigorously promote the Olympic spirit and the Chinese sports spirit in the competition, and contribute youth and strength to the motherland and people. ”

;

;In the rowing women’s lightweight double sculls final that ended on September 24, the Chinese sports delegation’s pairing of Zou Jiaqi and Qiu Xiuping won the championship with an absolute lead, winning the first Asian Games title. A gold medal and a "good start". After the game, the two young athletes were very excited. Zou Jiaqi said: "When we stand on the field, we will go all out and fight tenaciously in every game to achieve good results, win glory for our motherland and add color to our lives." Qiu Xiuping said: "This championship further inspires our confidence. In the future, we must train harder and be down-to-earth to show the spirit of the new generation of Chinese youth in the arena."

;

;Bi Donghai, Secretary of the Party Committee of the Weightlifting Wrestling Judo Sports Management Center of the State General Administration of Sports, said that the Chinese weightlifting team has just finished The journey to the World Weightlifting Championships begins with the Asian Games. It is the first time for the Chinese weightlifting team to participate in important events in such a short period of time. "The team members need to continuously control their weight, restore their physical fitness, and prevent injuries. We must maintain high morale, train hard, and challenge new limits in the Asian Games."

;

;Wang Yunlong, the leader of the Chinese rock climbing team, said: "The team members We will work hard in the speed event and strive to achieve new breakthroughs. At the same time, we will enhance our understanding with the participating teams through friendly exchanges and gather more positive energy for sports development."

;

;Born in Hangzhou, Zhejiang Province Tennis player Wu Yibing is participating in the Asian Games for the second time and will compete in the men's singles and men's doubles competitions in this Asian Games. "I am very proud to return to my hometown to compete. Although there is pressure, I will fully enjoy this competition. I hope everyone can leave a good memory in Hangzhou." Wu Yibing said, "The young people of our generation shoulder a glorious mission. We have Dare to achieve your goals and pursue your dreams. As young athletes, we must show our best selves on the Asian Games stage and strive for more honors for our motherland."

;

;Since the start of this Asian Games, China has The athletes of the team worked hard to achieve the goal of "double harvest in sports performance and spiritual civilization". With the responsibility of "the mission is on our shoulders and the struggle is ours", we will work hard, surpass ourselves, and win glory for our country. We will surely be able to show the world the powerful power of Chinese-style modern sports practice and make new contributions to the development of the Asian and international Olympic movements.

;

;(Our reporters Ma Jian, Jiang Nan, Dou Hao, Dou Hanyang, Zhao Mengyang, Li Shuo, Sun Longfei, Li Xinyi, Zheng Yi, Li Yang)

; Mon, 25 Sep 2023 06:26:09 +0800 01版要闻 - 开拓创新、担当作为，汇聚起推进新型工业化的强大力量http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/25/nw.D110000renmrb_20230925_2-01.htm
;Monday, September 25, 2023
; ;

;“In the new era and new journey, to comprehensively promote the construction of a strong country and the great cause of national rejuvenation with Chinese-style modernization, the realization of new industrialization is the key Task." The National Conference on Promotion of New Industrialization was held in Beijing a few days ago, at which important instructions from General Secretary Xi Jinping on promoting new industrialization were conveyed.

;

;Participants and people from all walks of life said that General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important instructions are an action plan and scientific guide for promoting new industrialization in the new era and new journey. They must pioneer and innovate, take responsibility, and gather the spirit of promoting new industrialization. Great power.

;

;“General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important instructions have a strong political, ideological and guiding nature, which greatly inspired us and doubled our motivation.” Wang Weiming, Director of the First Department of Equipment Industry of the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology, said, We must aim at the overall goal of basically realizing new industrialization by 2035, focus on high-end equipment manufacturing, promptly implement a number of major projects, and strive to create more important national weapons and new business cards made in China to provide solid support for promoting new industrialization.

;

;After listening to and studying the important instructions of General Secretary Xi Jinping on the spot, Xue Min, Chairman of Shanghai United Imaging Medical Technology Group Co., Ltd., said with emotion: "General Secretary Xi Jinping attaches great importance to promoting new industrialization and has elevated it to a relationship with The strategic height of comprehensively promoting the construction of a strong country and the great cause of national rejuvenation makes us more determined and more confident to catch up with the world's first-class level."

;

;Xue Min said that as a medical equipment manufacturing company, United Imaging will Accelerate breakthroughs in key core technologies, join forces with scientific research institutes and research-based medical institutions to jointly tackle key problems, and strive to achieve complete independent control of core technologies and core components as soon as possible.

;

;“General Secretary Xi Jinping emphasized that the requirements of high-quality development should be implemented throughout the entire process of new industrialization, which impressed me deeply.” Zhang Li, President of China Electronic Information Industry Development Research Institute, said that adhering to the orientation of high-quality development, We will neither follow the old path taken by Western countries nor our country's traditional industrialization path in the past. Instead, we will fully, accurately and comprehensively implement the new development concept and take a new industrialization path that promotes the transformation and transformation of development methods and the optimization and upgrading of development paths.

;

;At the site of the Fuzhou-Xiamen high-speed railway that is about to be put into operation, Lin Chao, a senior engineer from the Fourth Institute of China Railway Construction, is testing the high-speed rail track health monitoring system.

;

;Lin Chao said that General Secretary Xi Jinping proposed to implement the new development concept completely, accurately and comprehensively. Enterprises must work hard on “newness”. In the next step, the company will strive to build a "Chinese-style" intelligent survey and design platform, change the traditional production model of the survey and design industry, realize the overall leap from engineering design to digitalization and intelligence, and polish China's high-speed rail as a world-famous business card.

;

;General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important instructions deeply excited Wang Hanchao, founder of Ligo New Energy, a manufacturer of power battery management systems. "Currently, the rapid development of new energy vehicles has put forward higher requirements for supporting industrial chains, and more and more parts companies are competing with global companies. We will further extend the industrial chain and enhance the competitiveness of enterprises by accelerating the deployment of energy storage. "He said.

;

;High-end CNC machine tools are an important part of strategic emerging industries and an important cornerstone of new industrialization. Yu Xubo, chairman of China General Technology (Group) Holdings Co., Ltd., said that General Technology Group, as the "national team" in the high-end CNC machine tool industry, will proactively adapt to and lead the new round of technological revolution and industrial transformation in accordance with the requirements of the General Secretary. Cooperate with the upper, middle and lower reaches of the industrial chain, as well as large and medium-sized enterprises to jointly supplement and strengthen the chain, synchronize research and development, simultaneous verification, and benefit sharing, and promote the realization of independent control of the industrial chain and supply chain.

;

;After learning General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important instructions, Zhou Wei, a front-line scientific researcher at Antelope Industrial Internet Co., Ltd., said: “General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important instructions once again emphasize innovation, and our scientific researchers must study technology in a down-to-earth manner. , do a good job in the research and development and application of the Antelope industrial model, use technology to liberate factory productivity, and contribute to promoting the high-quality development of new industrialization."

;

;"General Secretary Xi Jinping called for building a manufacturing power while developing the digital economy , industrial informatization and other organic combinations, we feel a great responsibility." Zheng Lei, director of the Sichuan Provincial Communications Administration Bureau, said that promoting the construction of new infrastructure will further lay a solid foundation for new industrialization, and we will accelerate the construction and application of new information infrastructure. Deeply promote the deep integration of informatization and industrialization, accelerate the large-scale application of "5G + Industrial Internet", promote the "intelligent transformation and digital transformation" of industrial enterprises, and better empower high-quality economic and social development.

;

;The business environment, industrial policies, factor guarantees, etc. are crucial to promoting new industrialization.

;

;Zhu Aixun, Director of the Jiangsu Provincial Department of Industry and Information Technology, said that to fully implement the spirit of General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important instructions, Jiangsu will continue to focus on high-end, intelligent, and green efforts, and strive to create a quality-effective, The industrial development pattern of independent innovation, digital and real integration, green and low-carbon, and coordinated development will demonstrate greater responsibility on the road to new industrialization.

;

;"General Secretary Xi Jinping emphasized that promoting new industrialization is a systematic project. Promoting new industrialization requires stimulating the power of the government, enterprises, society and other aspects." Xu Hongqiu, deputy director of the Chongqing Liangjiang New Area Management Committee, said Liangjiang The new district is accelerating the creation of a modern manufacturing industry cluster. It will attract upstream and downstream ecological enterprises around chain owners, promote industry chain clusters, fully mobilize the enthusiasm of various business entities, and effectively enhance the power and vitality of promoting new industrialization.

;

;“General Secretary Xi Jinping proposed to gather powerful forces to promote new industrialization. This makes us very excited.” Wang Yang, a professor at the Internet of Things Research Institute of Shenzhen Vocational and Technical University, said that talent is the key to promoting new industrialization. , as front-line personnel in education, we will pay more attention to the cultivation of reserve and new forces, cultivate high-quality skilled personnel and engineers in response to new industry trends and new market demands, and provide talent support for building a manufacturing powerhouse.

;

;(Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, September 24)

;; Mon, 25 Sep 2023 06:26:09 +0800 01版要闻 - 为中国式现代化构筑强大物质技术基础http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/25/nw.D110000renmrb_20230925_3-01.htm
;Monday, September 25, 2023
; ;

;“In the new era and new journey, to comprehensively promote the construction of a strong country and the great cause of national rejuvenation with Chinese-style modernization, the realization of new industrialization is the key Task." From September 22 to 23, the National New Industrialization Promotion Conference was held in Beijing. General Secretary Xi Jinping made important instructions on promoting new industrialization, profoundly expounding the great significance, important principles and key tasks of promoting new industrialization in the new era and new journey. It has a strong political, ideological and guiding nature and provides guidance for doing a good job in relevant work. direction.

;

;Industrialization is the premise and foundation of modernization. Since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping as the core has made major strategic arrangements to promote new industrialization based on the overall development of the party and the country's cause, and has taken solid steps to promote my country's new industrialization. It has 41 major industrial categories, 207 intermediate industrial categories, and 666 small industrial categories. It has become the only country in the world that has all industrial categories in the United Nations Industrial Classification. The scale of its manufacturing industry has ranked first in the world for 13 consecutive years, and its output of new energy vehicles and photovoltaics has ranked first in the world. It has maintained the first place in the world for many consecutive years, cultivated 45 national advanced manufacturing clusters, and built the world's largest and technologically leading mobile communication network... my country's industrial scale has grown steadily, the industrial structure has continued to be optimized, and the digital and green transformation has continued to advance. China's economy is strong and strong, and it is constantly cultivating new competitiveness.

;

;Observe the general trend, take the direction, and plan for the overall situation. It was pointed out that “our country is a big country and must develop the real economy, continuously promote industrial modernization, and improve the level of manufacturing.” “Building a modern and powerful socialist country and developing and strengthening the real economy are inseparable from the manufacturing industry. We must continue to work hard to promote industrial optimization and upgrading. ", emphasizing that "the focus of economic development should be on the real economy and promoting new industrialization" and "focusing on the transformation and upgrading of traditional industries on the one hand, and the development and growth of strategic emerging industries on the other", requiring "continue to do a good job in the deep integration of informatization and industrialization" This big article promotes the manufacturing industry to accelerate the development of digitalization, networking, and intelligence" and "promote the deep integration of the Internet, big data, artificial intelligence, and the real economy"... Since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, General Secretary Xi Jinping has proposed a new type of industrialization. It made important expositions on a series of major theoretical and practical issues, which greatly enriched and developed our party's understanding of the laws of industrialization, and provided fundamental compliance and action guidelines for us to promote new industrialization.

;

;Without a solid material and technological foundation, it is impossible to comprehensively build a modern and powerful socialist country. At present, the digital transformation of the economy and society is accelerating, and information technology, biotechnology, and manufacturing technology are actively innovating and evolving at an accelerated pace. We are facing both rare historical opportunities and severe challenges. We must deeply realize that the modern industrial system is the material and technological foundation of a modern country. Accelerating the construction of a modern industrial system supported by the real economy is related to our strategic initiative in future development and international competition. On the new journey, we must thoroughly understand General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important instructions and important expositions on new industrialization, firmly grasp the primary task of high-quality development and the strategic task of building a new development pattern, and deeply grasp the basic laws of promoting new industrialization. Actively adapt to and lead the new round of scientific and technological revolution and industrial transformation, seize the key task of realizing new industrialization, and build a strong material and technological foundation for Chinese-style modernization.

;

;To build a strong material and technological foundation for Chinese-style modernization, we must integrate the requirements of high-quality development throughout the entire process of new industrialization, and organically combine the construction of a manufacturing power with the development of digital economy and industrial informatization. It is necessary to fully, accurately and comprehensively implement the new development concept, coordinate development and security, accurately grasp the strategic positioning, stage characteristics and changes in environmental conditions to promote new industrialization, adhere to the path of new industrialization with Chinese characteristics, accelerate the construction of a manufacturing power, and provide better services Build a new development pattern, promote high-quality development, and realize Chinese-style modernization. It is necessary to adapt to the requirements of the times and changes in the situation, highlight the key points and seize the key, strive to improve the resilience and safety level of the industrial chain and supply chain, accelerate the improvement of industrial innovation capabilities, continue to promote the optimization and upgrading of the industrial structure, vigorously promote the deep integration of digital technology and the real economy, and comprehensively Promote green development of industry. We must persist in deepening reform and expanding opening up, promote the complementary advantages and competitive development of various enterprises, give full play to the supporting role of the national unified market, guide the rational layout of industries with the main functional area strategy, make good use of the resources of both domestic and international markets, and continuously strengthen the promotion of The driving force and vitality of new industrialization.

;

;To build a strong material and technological foundation for Chinese-style modernization, we must strengthen organizational leadership, policy support and talent guarantee, and gather powerful forces to promote new industrialization. General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out: "Promoting new industrialization is a systematic project." It is necessary to insist on the overall leadership of the party throughout the entire process of promoting new industrialization, improve the unified leadership of the party committee (party group), the government is responsible for implementation, the enterprise plays the main role, and the society We will work in a work pattern with extensive participation of all forces, ensure all aspects of policies and elements, strengthen political responsibility, establish a firm concept of the system, carry forward the spirit of struggle, continue to work hard to strengthen scientific and technological innovation, ensure industrial safety, optimize the industrial structure, and promote system upgrading. We will continue to work hard to promote industrial digitalization and green transformation, continue to work hard to deepen reform and opening up, add momentum and vitality, and solidly promote the implementation of various key tasks in new industrialization.

;

;The 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China clarified the goal of "basically realizing new industrialization" by 2035, and made major arrangements around building a modern industrial system and promoting new industrialization. Let us unite more closely around the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping as the core, adhere to the guidance of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, fully implement the spirit of the 20th National Congress of the Party, and deeply understand the decisive significance of the "two establishments" , strengthen the "four consciousnesses", strengthen the "four self-confidences", achieve "two safeguards", pioneer and innovate, take on responsibilities, accelerate the process of Chinese modernization with new results of new industrialization development, and make contributions to the comprehensive construction of a modern and powerful socialist country. New and greater contributions.

;; Mon, 25 Sep 2023 06:26:09 +0800 01版要闻 - 第五届国际道教论坛在中国茅山开幕http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/25/nw.D110000renmrb_20230925_4-01.htm
;Monday, September 25, 2023
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Nanjing, September 24th  The 5th International Taoist Forum will be held in China on September 24th Jiangsu Maoshan opened. Wang Huning, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, sent a congratulatory letter to congratulate the forum and the establishment of the World Taoist Federation, and extend greetings to the guests who attended the forum and the founding meeting of the World Taoist Federation.

;

;Wang Huning said that Taoism is both ancient and modern. Taoism is rooted in the fertile soil of Chinese culture. It contains rich humanistic thoughts and condenses ancient oriental wisdom. Its philosophical thoughts of the unity of man and nature and Tao following nature, the moral pursuit of goodness as water and uncompromising moral pursuits, and the spirit of peace, tolerance, unity and love. The values ​​and the ecological wisdom of longevity and harmonious coexistence will last forever and remain new over time. With the theme of "Advocating Taoism and Morality, Walking Together with the World", this forum demonstrates the desire to share the achievements of human civilization and build a beautiful homeland for mankind.

;

;Wang Huning pointed out that this forum announced the establishment of the World Taoist Federation, which is the common aspiration of the international Taoist community. It has established a new platform to explore the value of Taoist culture in the era, and will definitely promote exchanges and mutual learning among human civilizations. Contribute Taoist wisdom to solve the problems of the times and enhance the common welfare of mankind.

;

;Wang Huning said that the Chinese government will actively implement the global civilization initiative proposed by President Xi Jinping, and will continue to support the Chinese Taoist community and overseas Taoist communities to carry out in-depth friendly exchanges, work side by side, practice morality, and promote lasting peace in the world. and contribute to shared prosperity.

;

;Shi Taifeng, member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Minister of the United Front Work Department of the CPC Central Committee, attended the opening ceremony of the forum and the founding meeting of the World Taoist Federation and delivered speeches respectively. He said that the holding of the forum was conducive to closer friendly exchanges between Chinese and foreign Taoist circles and promoted exchanges and mutual learning between Chinese civilization and different civilizations in the world. It is hoped that the World Taoist Federation will fully play its active role and contribute wisdom and strength to world peace and development.

;

;This forum is hosted by the China Taoist Association and the Chinese Religious and Cultural Exchange Association, and co-organized by the Hong Kong Taoist Federation, the Macau Taoist Association, and the Taiwan Chinese Taoist Federation. The theme is "Advocating Taoism and Morality, Walking Together with the World." During the forum, the founding meeting of the World Taoist Federation was held, and the first council of the World Taoist Federation was elected. Li Guangfu, president of the China Taoist Association, was elected as the chairman. The World Taoist Federation was initiated and established by the China Taoist Association. It is an international, professional, non-profit organization voluntarily formed by Taoist groups, Taoist temples, Taoist-related institutions and celebrities who believe in Taoism or love Taoist culture in various countries (regions). social organization. There are currently 52 founding members from 20 countries and regions around the world.

;; Mon, 25 Sep 2023 06:26:09 +0800 01版要闻 - 亚运会开幕后首个比赛日产生31枚金牌（亚运速递）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/25/nw.D110000renmrb_20230925_5-01.htm
;Monday, September 25, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;On September 24, won the Asian Games The Chinese team combination Zou Jiaqi (third from left)/Qiu Xiuping (third from right), who won their first gold medal, were at the award ceremony.
;Photographed by our reporter Zhang Wujun

;
; ;

;Our newspaper, Hangzhou, September 24th   (Reporters Zheng Yi, Wang Liang, Tao Xiang'an) On September 24, the first competition day after the opening of the 19th Asian Games in Hangzhou, athletes from all delegations fought bravely and the competition was exciting. A total of 31 gold medals were produced in various major venues. . The Chinese team athletes performed well and won a total of 20 gold medals, 7 silver medals and 3 bronze medals in rowing, martial arts, shooting, modern pentathlon, swimming, gymnastics and other events.

;

;In the rowing event, Zou Jiaqi/Qiu Xiuping won the women's lightweight double sculls championship, winning a "good start" for the Chinese sports delegation. This was also the first gold medal at this Asian Games. Subsequently, the Chinese team players continued their efforts and won 5 more gold medals in rowing events.

;

;In the martial arts competition, the Chinese team won two gold medals. Sun Peiyuan won the gold medal in the men's Changquan final, and Tong Xin won the gold medal in the women's Tai Chi Tai Chi Sword all-around final.

;

;Two competitions were held in the shooting event. In the women's 10-meter air rifle team competition, the Chinese team won the gold medal with a score of 1896.6 rings and set a new Asian record; in the individual competition, Huang Yuting set a new competition record And win gold.

;

;In the modern pentathlon competition, the Chinese team won 2 gold medals, 1 silver medal and 2 bronze medals. Among them, in the women's individual competition, Chinese team players Zhang Mingyu and Bian Yufei won the gold medal and bronze medal respectively; in the women's team competition, the Chinese team won the gold medal.

;

;There are frequent reports of good news for the Chinese team in swimming competitions. Zhang Yufei, Wang Shun, Qin Haiyang, Li Bingjie and other famous players all appeared on the stage, and finally won all 7 gold medals, and refreshed 3 Asian records and 7 competition records.

;

;In the men's gymnastics team final, the Chinese team composed of Zhang Boheng, Zou Jingyuan, Xiao Ruoteng, Lin Chaopan, and Lan Xingyu won the gold medal and successfully defended their title.

;

;(For special reports on the Hangzhou Asian Games, see pages 9 and 10)

; Mon, 25 Sep 2023 06:26:09 +0800 01版要闻 - 脱贫群众生活更上一层楼http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/25/nw.D110000renmrb_20230925_6-01.htm
;Monday, September 25, 2023
; ;

;The kiwi fruit with red heart is ripe. In the Modern Agricultural Park of Tingzi Town, Cangxi County, Sichuan, Zhang Xianzhi, a poverty-stricken household in Qinghe Village, works hard. "With standardization and digital management, I have a good harvest of 10 acres of red-heart kiwi fruits and a stable income."

;

;Rural Areas Industry is booming. In the Fengxi Bay Agricultural Ecological Demonstration Park in Huangpi Town, Ningdu County, Jiangxi, Liu Yuansheng, a household that has been lifted out of poverty, is busy receiving tourists. "Good scenery brings good prospects. Eat 'ecological rice' and your life will become more prosperous as time goes by."

;

; The prosperous days have confirmed the great achievements in poverty alleviation in the new era. Since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, under the strong leadership of the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping as the core, our country has organized and implemented the largest and most powerful poverty alleviation campaign in human history. All 98.99 million rural poor people have been lifted out of poverty under current standards, creating a A miracle on earth that shines brightly in the annals of history.

;

;Eliminating poverty is not the end, but the starting point of a new life and new struggle. General Secretary Xi Jinping profoundly pointed out: “Consolidating and expanding the results of poverty alleviation is the bottom-line task for comprehensively promoting rural revitalization.” The more eager you are."

;

;This year is the first year to fully implement the spirit of the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China. All regions and departments have tightened their responsibilities, implemented various tasks, solidly consolidated and expanded the results of poverty alleviation, and comprehensively promoted rural revitalization. , leading the masses out of poverty to move towards a prosperous, beautiful and happy life.

;

; ; Continue to provide assistance and firmly maintain the bottom line of preventing large-scale poverty return;

;

;General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out: “We must continue to promote the organic integration of the rural revitalization strategy. to ensure that large-scale poverty alleviation does not occur, and to effectively safeguard and consolidate the great achievements in the fight against poverty."

;

;All regions and departments have taken advantage of the situation, continued to struggle, made great efforts to consolidate the foundation for poverty alleviation, and firmly defended the prevention of poverty alleviation. The bottom line for large-scale return to poverty.

;

;——The assistance is continuous and the investment is undiminished.

;

;Walking into Jianjiang Village, Shiling Town, Baoting Li and Miao Autonomous County, Hainan, you will be intoxicated by the beautiful Li Tao Village Road, the fragrant Niulan Coffee, and the livable village. "From impoverished villages to rural revitalization demonstration sites, we insist on precise policies and use development methods to consolidate and expand the results of poverty alleviation." Zhou Shengjing, the first secretary of Jiancheng Village, said that through the improvement of the living environment, old houses have been transformed into cafes, using policy funds A professional cooperative was established to develop more than 70 acres of colorful leaf cultivation, and each household in the village that was lifted out of poverty received an annual dividend of 15,000 yuan.

;

;The Party Central Committee decided to establish a five-year transition period from the date of poverty alleviation for counties that have been lifted out of poverty. During the transition period, the main assistance policies will be maintained generally stable, existing assistance policies will be optimized and adjusted item by category, and the transition will gradually be made from concentrating resources to support poverty alleviation to comprehensively promoting rural revitalization. This year, the central government has allocated 175 billion yuan in subsidy funds for poverty alleviation and rural revitalization, an increase of 10 billion yuan over last year.

;

;The village-based assistance program continues to go all out, with 209,600 first secretaries and 563,000 village-based team members taking over the baton of poverty alleviation and working hard to consolidate the results.

;

;——Build a strong “poverty prevention dam” and accurately prevent a return to poverty.

;

;“Good policies followed closely and helped our family tide over the difficulties smoothly.” Cheng Pingwei, a household that had been lifted out of poverty in Xinping Village, Taiyu Town, Binzhou City, Shaanxi Province, fell ill and was hospitalized last year. The city’s dynamic monitoring to prevent return to poverty was timely It was found that assistance measures were immediately followed up, eliminating the risk of returning to poverty.

;

;The prevention of return to poverty monitoring and assistance is fully covered, and households at risk of returning to poverty should be fully supported and supported. About 65% of the monitored objects nationwide have eliminated the risk of returning to poverty, and the rest have also implemented corresponding assistance measures. .

;

;In order to further establish the bottom line for preventing return to poverty, the National Medical Insurance Administration and other five departments issued a notice to improve and improve the long-term mechanism to prevent and resolve the return to poverty due to illness to ensure that the medical insurance participation rate of rural low-income people and those who have been lifted out of poverty is stable. Above 99%. Precise policies are implemented in various places to implement at least one developmental assistance measure for monitoring households with the ability to work; for monitoring households without the ability to work, provide basic protection and gradually improve the level of security; monitor those who fall into short-term poverty households, solve the basic living and "two worries and three guarantees" issues as soon as possible, and resolutely prevent the phenomenon of entire villages and entire villages returning to poverty.

;

; ;Strengthen industries, expand employment, and make poverty alleviation results more sustainable;

;

;The continued increase in income of those who have been lifted out of poverty is an important sign of the consolidation of the results in poverty alleviation. All regions and departments take increasing the income of people who have been lifted out of poverty as their main focus, and promote various resources and assistance measures to focus on promoting industrial development and expanding employment, so as to make the results of poverty alleviation more sustainable.

;

;——Cultivation and promotion of industries can effectively drive people out of poverty to increase their income and become rich.

;

;“The fruit is very sweet, and the professional cooperatives purchase it uniformly. There is no need to worry about sales. In the past few years, the annual income has been 50,000 to 60,000 yuan.” Chen Zhongyi, a poverty-stricken household in Mati Community, Mati Town, Gulin County, Sichuan, planted 11 A bumper harvest of sweet oranges is in sight. Relying on the sweet orange industry, the collective economy of 32 poverty-stricken villages in Gulin County increased by an average of 50,000 yuan per year, and the average annual income of 2,796 poverty-stricken households increased by 12,000 yuan.

;

;Gulin County has developed 850,000 acres of specialty industries, cultivated 17 modern agricultural parks at or above the county level, and built 218 village-level poverty alleviation industrial parks, realizing the goal of "townships having large-scale bases and villages having pillar industries" ", every household has a way to increase income", laying a solid foundation for the sustained and stable income increase of those who have been lifted out of poverty.

;

;Developing industries is the fundamental strategy to consolidate and expand the results of poverty alleviation. At present, every county that has been lifted out of poverty across the country has formed 2 to 3 characteristic leading industries, and nearly three-quarters of the people who have been lifted out of poverty have established close interest-linked relationships with new business entities. Last year, the per capita net operating income of people lifted out of poverty was 2,098 yuan, a year-on-year increase of 22.5%.

;

;今年中央财政衔接推进乡村振兴补助资金60%以上将用于支持产业发展，实施一批整体性区域性产业项目，健全联农带农益农机制，让脱贫群众更多分享产业增值收益。

;

;——大力稳岗就业，脱贫群众干活有劲头、生活有奔头。

;

;前不久，河南西峡县桑坪镇职业技能培训班结业，77名脱贫群众和动态监测对象通过结业考试，领到职业技能等级证书。

;

;“通过培训，我掌握了烹饪、按摩等新技能，拿到证书后工作就更稳了，工资也能跟着涨！”桑坪镇仓房村脱贫户吕时伟说。

;

;西峡县将技能培训作为提升脱贫群众就业能力的重要举措，根据脱贫群众意愿，围绕养老护理、营养餐制作等课程开展订单式培训，确保培训后即可上岗。

;

;积极扩大就业是增强脱贫群众内生发展动力的重要途径。去年全国脱贫劳动力务工规模达到3277.9万人，超过年度目标任务258.7万人。今年脱贫劳动力就业规模要实现稳定在3000万人以上的目标。 “下一步要发展比较优势明显、带动能力强、就业容量大的县域富民产业，在农村工程项目建设中推行以工代赈，拓展公益性岗位，吸纳农民在家门口就业增收。加大对脱贫劳动力的就业服务和技能培训力度，积极引导外出务工就业。”北京师范大学中国乡村振兴与发展研究中心主任张琦说。

;

;;增强内生动力，接续奋斗，谱写乡村振兴新篇章;

;

;脱贫地区发展底子薄、基础差，如何巩固拓展脱贫攻坚成果、接续推进乡村振兴？

;

;各地区各部门着力增强脱贫地区和脱贫群众内生发展动力，用脱贫攻坚的“金钥匙”，开启乡村振兴的“致富门”。

;

;——政策衔接好、措施落到位，汇聚全面推进乡村振兴的磅礴动能。

;

;“从'万企帮万村'到'万企兴万村'，脱贫后接续助力乡村振兴成了我们的帮扶工作重点。”云南楚雄彝族自治州永仁县哲林实业有限公司董事长张一林介绍，公司与项目区周边群众成立合作社，种植芒果达10余万亩。截至去年底，楚雄州共组织495个民营企业参与“万企兴万村”行动，实施项目609个，惠及334个村。

;

;在脱贫地区，巩固拓展脱贫攻坚成果同乡村振兴有效衔接深入推进。人才支持加大，向160个国家乡村振兴重点帮扶县选派科技特派团，开展教育、医疗干部人才组团式帮扶，为其他672个脱贫县选派产业顾问组。项目帮扶加力，9799家民营企业帮扶160个重点县，实施产业帮扶项目7725个，惠及脱贫人口325.56万人。

;

;今年以来，各地区各部门继续强化支撑保障。中央财政衔接推进乡村振兴补助资金将优先保障到人到户项目需求，支持联农带农富农产业发展。相关部门还将启动实施乡村振兴人才支持专项计划，全面启动乡村产业振兴带头人“头雁”培育工作。

;

;——学会致富技能、补上发展短板，增强脱贫地区和脱贫群众内生发展动力。

;

;河北邯郸市魏县东代固镇的帮扶微工厂里，脱贫户张瑞红正带着乡亲们赶制服装订单，“经过技能培训，乡亲们在家门口上班，靠手艺吃饭，日子越过越好。”去年魏县帮扶微工厂经济效益平均提升15%，务工人员月均收入增加300元，带动同期就业增加1100人。兴产业、促就业，各地区各部门千方百计让脱贫群众在辛勤劳动中增强自力更生的能力，激发依靠自身力量发展的志气心气底气。

;

;补齐短板，脱贫地区发展后劲更足。

;

;天还没亮，江西瑞金市武阳镇武阳村农产品物流中心里，厢式货车整装待发。驻村第一书记邓亮说：“中心建好后，降低了物流成本，提升了盈利和抗风险能力，脐橙等特色产业发展动力更足了。”

;

;广大脱贫地区发展环境越来越好，人才、资金等要素加速汇聚，生态旅游、农村电商等新业态风生水起，一大批企业、大学毕业生、返乡农民工创新创业，发展活力日益增强。

;

;迈上新征程，开启新奋斗。继续扎实巩固拓展脱贫攻坚成果，加快推进乡村振兴，广大脱贫群众的生活定能芝麻开花节节高。

;; Mon, 25 Sep 2023 06:26:09 +0800 01版要闻 - 让农民腰包越来越鼓、生活越来越美好（今日谈）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/25/nw.D110000renmrb_20230925_7-01.htm
;2023年09月25日星期一
; ;

;农历秋分时，又迎丰收节。希望的田野上，处处是五彩斑斓的景致，人们欢庆丰收、分享喜悦。

;

;“让农民腰包越来越鼓、生活越来越美好，绘就宜居宜业和美乡村新画卷！”在第六个“中国农民丰收节”到来之际，习近平总书记代表党中央，向全国广大农民和工作在“三农”战线上的同志们致以节日祝贺和诚挚问候，强调“扎实做好新时代新征程'三农'工作”，要求“坚持把增加农民收入作为'三农'工作的中心任务，千方百计拓宽农民增收致富渠道”。

;

;农业根基稳，发展底气足。全年粮食生产有望再获丰收，这样的成绩来之不易。今年以来，我们不误农时抓生产，全力抗灾减灾夺丰收，战胜了一个又一个挑战。一季季沉甸甸的收获，承载着广大农民的辛勤和努力，凝结着“三农”战线上同志们的智慧与汗水。我们同庆丰收，也是礼赞奋斗、致敬农民。

;

;让广大农民丰收又增收，离不开全社会的共同努力。营造全社会关注农业、关心农村、关爱农民的浓厚氛围，调动亿万农民重农务农的积极性、主动性、创造性，丰收的画卷必将越绘越壮美，乡亲们的日子定会越过越红火。

;; Mon, 25 Sep 2023 06:26:09 +0800 02版要闻 - 抗旱保丰收 科技提单产（打好夺取秋粮丰收这场硬仗）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/25/nw.D110000renmrb_20230925_1-02.htm
;2023年09月25日星期一
; ;

;无人机飞过，水雾均匀喷洒。在甘肃省张掖市山丹县，抗旱小分队深入田间，指导“一喷多促”。“不到2个小时，300多亩玉米喝足了'营养液'，促增长、促灌浆、保产量。”东乐镇城西村种植户黄国荣说。

;

;农机隆隆驶过，圆滚滚的马铃薯从土里“跳”出。白银市景泰县万亩马铃薯基地迎来丰收。采收、分拣、装袋，平均每天有600多吨马铃薯从这里运出。

;

;从河西走廊到陇中大地，再到陇上江南，秋粮进入生产关键期。今年6月以来，河西及中部地区旱情蔓延。甘肃省一手抓抗旱减灾，最大程度降低损失；一手抓田间管理，统防统治，稳长促壮，以丰补歉。

;

;粮食安全是“国之大者”。甘肃省千方百计挖掘粮食增产潜力，粮食总产量保持在1200万吨以上，从2019年开始，实现从粮食产销平衡省到净调出省的历史性转变。

;

; ; 全力供水，抗旱保产;

;

;河道来水偏少、水库蓄水减少……面对严峻旱情，甘肃省各地各相关部门全力调水供水、加强监测调度、优化技术服务，最大程度减轻旱灾损失。

;

;一本“用水账”，水利部门算了又算。“我们灌区紧急调来45万立方米灌溉水，3个乡镇均分，能满足1.2万亩农田用水。”武威市古浪县古浪河水管处东干渠水利管理所所长麻海石说。

;

;连日来，管理所员工昼夜值守，精细配水。“我们及时开闭闸门，精准放水，把来之不易的水用在刀刃上。”麻海石说。目前古浪河灌区每天配水量约为6万立方米。

;

;在土门镇三关村，打井现场，机器轰鸣。土门镇农业农村综合服务中心主任杨发东说：“2个专班全力作业，开挖两口应急井，为大家伙儿多补充水源。”

;

;三关村村民严培宗说：“玉米已浇上灌区'保产水'，接着还能用上应急井水，这一茬庄稼保住了。”

;

;一本“粮食账”，让农民心里有了底。“6亩麦子，7月收完，亩产800多斤；7亩玉米，预计亩产1500斤，稍有减产，算大账还是丰收。”严培宗说。

;

;目前古浪县农作物受灾面积38.6万亩，占播种面积27%左右。古浪县水务局副局长王岳亭介绍：“我们千方百计调水找水，878眼机井满负荷运行，27眼应急机井加紧开掘，协调景电二期工程较去年同期新增调水300多万立方米。”

;

;全力供水，抗旱保产。甘肃省水利厅水旱灾害防御处处长贾珺奎介绍，水利部门统筹保供和保灌，加大骨干水利工程供水，加快建设抗旱机井。目前景泰川电力提灌工程、引大入秦、引洮供水等重点工程供水14.79亿立方米，灌溉面积1162万亩（次）。全省已开工打井320眼。

;

;抗旱减损，田管还得跟紧。

;

;60架无人机接力作业，12万亩玉米、3.4万亩马铃薯统一飞防，金昌市永昌县抢抓节点，开展“一喷多促”。东寨镇龙口村种粮大户张路安舒了口气，“保水剂加抗旱剂，鼓粒灌浆，亩产预计在1500斤上下。”

;

;8月18日，财政部、农业农村部先期安排甘肃农作物“一喷多促”资金7511万元。甘肃省各级农业农村部门强化技术指导，着力提升农作物抗旱能力。

;

;提早谋划秋冬种，鼓励改种、补种、复种。“复种一季娃娃菜，预计亩均收入有7000元。”永昌县六坝镇下排村种植户焦玉喜说。永昌县按照“宜菜则菜、宜草则草”原则，指导农民播种生长期短、抗旱力强的绿肥、饲草、速生菜等，完成复种4.8万亩。

;

;“4500多亩玉米受旱，一部分改为青贮饲料，一部分复种豌豆、萝卜，保险公司每亩赔付300元。接下来，把蔬菜管好，争取卖个好价钱。”古浪县西靖镇阳光新村种植大户胡正燕算起账。古浪县协调承保机构开辟绿色通道，已赔付1727.65万元；抢时抢墒复种蔬菜、饲草等作物4100亩。

;

;防灾减灾措施精准到田到户。甘肃省农业农村厅提出，分作物、分区域、分品种制定措施，农技人员包区包片指导，及时抢收已成熟的玉米、大豆，对于尚未成熟的农作物强化指导，力争保产量、保丰收。

;

;;科技提单产，增添新动能;

;

;行走在陇原大地，广袤田野上，一项项新技术落地，一台台大农机驰骋，为粮食生产增添新动能。

;

;农机农艺融合，节本增效。

;

;在张掖市民乐县六坝镇千亩马铃薯种植基地，黄澄澄的马铃薯铺满田畴，等待装车运输。“8000多亩马铃薯亩产比平均水平高出1000多斤。”甘肃鼎丰马铃薯种业有限公司负责人薛贵民说。

;

;好收成从哪儿来？“种地靠技术。”薛贵民介绍，动力耙劲儿大，犁得深；牵引式打药机，排量大、更灵活；大型收获机马力全开，一天能收100多亩，“算下来，每亩减少人工费用300多元。”

;

;说起技术“套餐”，薛贵民打开话匣子：“合理轮作倒茬，减肥减水，绿色种植，每亩地节水四成，节肥近三成。”

;

;张掖市立足气候冷凉、土质疏松等特点，大力发展马铃薯产业。今年全市种植马铃薯30.78万亩，预计总产量达91万吨以上。

;

;“马铃薯种植面积和产量占全省粮食播种面积和产量的1/4以上。”甘肃省农业农村厅有关负责人说。当地选育优良品种、推广先进技术、加强典型示范，全年马铃薯面积稳定在1000万亩左右，平均亩产达到1.5吨。

;

;甘肃省聚焦千万亩以上的小麦、玉米、马铃薯三大粮食作物，稳面积、提单产、增效益。在河西和沿黄灌区积极开展玉米单产提升工程，推广抗旱高产品种，在中东部地区重点抓好玉米收获机械化，带动玉米产量和效益双提升；打造高标准“梯田+马铃薯”产业带，辐射带动优势区面积近900万亩；主产市县积极推广抗旱抗寒抗病的优质小麦新品种，推广宽幅匀播、浅埋滴灌等增产技术。

;

;农以种为先。甘肃以良种攻关为突破口，补短板、强优势。

;

;“30多亩地刚收完，我和制种企业签了订单，每亩保底收入4000元。”张掖市临泽县壕洼村村民牛天红说。壕洼村发展1.4万多亩制种玉米，6个品系合理搭配，错峰收获。

;

;田间连车间。在张掖市登海种业，200多台（套）全自动化设备，日产种子180吨。依托中种国际种子有限公司、张掖市三北种业有限公司，建设玉米种质资源库（圃）。育繁推一体化产业链条不断延伸，张掖制种玉米年种植面积超100万亩。

;

;农业现代化，种子是基础。甘肃省保障了全国大田玉米50％以上的用种，今年落实玉米制种面积165万亩，预计产量6.98亿公斤。

;

; ; 夯实农业基础，稳步提升粮食产能;

;

;保障粮食安全，提升粮食产能是首要任务。甘肃省完善水利基础设施、提升耕地质量，增强农业防灾减灾能力。

;

;“种的是高标准农田，浇的是引洮工程的水，马铃薯长势不错，预计早熟品种亩产3吨，晚熟品种亩产3吨半。”定西市安定区百泉马铃薯种植基地负责人何小谦种了2000多亩马铃薯，这几天忙着防病虫、追水肥。

;

;有了引洮水，旱塬变粮田。“水渠引来的水先提到1万多立方米的蓄水池里，再通过滴灌带精准输送到根系，土壤不硬化，每亩节水四成以上。”何小谦说。

;

;粮田还得是良田。“这几年，地块平整了，面积变大了，机耕道修通了，大农机开得进，种地效率高。起垄黑膜覆盖，增墒保温，抑制杂草。安装水肥一体化设施，营养更均衡。”何小谦说。

;

;“陇中十年九旱，用水是关键。我们完善农田水利设施，建成高标准农田25万多亩，推广黑膜覆盖膜侧栽培技术，为马铃薯产业发展提供支撑。”安定区农业技术推广服务中心副主任刘小平介绍。

;

;农业基础设施加快完善。今年甘肃省水利厅实施调蓄设施、灌区改造等水利项目125个，17座水库（池）建成后将新增供水能力2.6亿立方米，6处大型灌区和19处中型灌区改造项目建成后，将有效改造灌区灌溉面积106.51万亩。今年全省将新建高标准农田265万亩。

;

;节水农业不断发展，用水效率提高，农业生产更可持续。

;

;“窄膜宽窄行种植技术，种肥同播、水肥一体、精准滴灌，一亩地能节水100多立方米。”金昌市金川区双湾镇营盘村种植大户姚吉文说，“亩均还能增产80至100公斤、增效350元左右。”

;

;甘肃省耕地亩均水资源量只有全国平均水平的1/4，鼓励使用节水品种、推广节水技术、推进农业水价改革，一系列举措拧紧“水龙头”。全省高效农田节水技术年推广面积稳定在1000万亩以上，其中水肥一体化技术推广面积400万亩以上，水资源利用率持续提高。

;

;坚决扛稳粮食安全重任，深入实施“藏粮于地、藏粮于技”战略，稳步提升粮食产能，甘肃奋力实现粮食生产新突破。

;; Mon, 25 Sep 2023 06:26:09 +0800 02版要闻 - 持续提升港口能力（实干笃行在一线）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/25/nw.D110000renmrb_20230925_2-02.htm
;2023年09月25日星期一
; ;

;河北沧州黄骅港煤炭港区，碧波万顷、巨轮穿梭。距离海岸线近10公里的海面上，航道疏浚船正在紧张作业。“开始放耙！”船长陈立强一声令下。船舶两侧的黄色机械臂齐刷刷向外延伸，黑色的耙头连着耙管缓缓沉入海底。不一会儿，海底的泥沙便和着海水通过耙管“喷”进泥舱之中……

;

;今年5月，习近平总书记在河北考察时来到黄骅港煤炭港区码头，了解河北省港口整合发展和黄骅港生产经营、发展规划等情况。习近平总书记强调，黄骅港作为我国西煤东运、北煤南运的重要枢纽港口，要加强港口能力建设，创新管理体制机制，打造多功能、综合性、现代化大港。

;

;国能黄骅港务有限责任公司工程管理中心主管梁秀忠说，加强港口能力建设的各项举措正迅速推进，“建设7万吨级双向航道、实现7万吨级船舶重载双向通航，就是其中重要一环。”前不久，长达11.48公里的7万吨级双向航道一期工程顺利通过竣工验收。眼下，航道维护清淤作业紧张进行，二期工程稳步推进。

;

;黄骅港煤炭港区航道位于淤泥粉砂质海岸带，滩浅、坡缓、回淤多，拓展航道不容易，实施疏浚清淤工程更是难上加难。在工程技术人员的指导下，陈立强和船员们将边坡区域按距海面深浅科学划分条块，使用不同舱容的疏浚船分区作业，既提高了效率，也保障了安全。

;

;海上浮标和陆上导标位置迁移等同步进行。“陆上导标最高的81米，移位最长的100多米，共16座，使用最大吊重1200吨的吊车依然惊心动魄。”梁秀忠介绍。

;

;“7万吨级双向航道建成后，港口作业效率将进一步提升，煤炭吞吐能力预计增加7个百分点。”梁秀忠说。

;本报北京9月24日电  （记者韩鑫）23日，由江苏省南京市公建中心建设、中交二航局参建的南京仙新路过江通道跨江大桥顺利合龙。

;

;仙新路过江通道位于南京市东北侧，全长约13.17公里。该通道关键控制性工程——仙新路长江大桥，主跨1760米，主塔高263.8米，建成后将成为国内第一、世界第三大跨度的悬索桥。

; Mon, 25 Sep 2023 06:26:09 +0800 02版要闻 - 为亚洲和国际奥林匹克运动发展作出新贡献http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-09/25/nw.D110000renmrb_20230925_4-02.htm
;2023年09月25日星期一
; ;

;9月23日晚，杭州第十九届亚洲运动会隆重开幕。国家主席习近平出席开幕式并宣布本届亚运会开幕，引发热烈反响。大家表示，将全力以赴、精益求精，为世界呈现一届“中国特色、亚洲风采、精彩纷呈”的体育盛会，为亚洲和国际奥林匹克运动发展作出新贡献。

;

; ; 为世界呈现一届“中国特色、亚洲风采、精彩纷呈”的体育盛会;

;

;在以习近平同志为核心的党中央坚强领导下，自成功申办杭州亚运会以来，浙江坚持贯彻“绿色、智能、节俭、文明”的办赛理念，全面落实“简约、安全、精彩”的办赛要求，全力以赴、精益求精，做好全链条全环节筹办工作。

;

;“习近平主席出席杭州亚运会开幕式并宣布本届亚运会开幕，我们非常激动，备受鼓舞。”杭州亚组委执行秘书长、杭州亚运会（亚残运会）主新闻发言人陈卫强说，“我们有信心为世界呈现一届'中国特色、亚洲风采、精彩纷呈'的体育盛会。”

;

;“我们要担负起使命，为呈现一场精彩赛会贡献力量，让来自各地的运动员们感到宾至如归。”宁波亚运分村运行团队执行指挥长石坚定说，地处半边山景区的亚运分村，能够满足近500名运动员及随队官员同时入住。

;

;“本届亚运会应用的阿尔巴诺系统，是赛艇、皮划艇专业竞赛中的一种航道系统，1/1000的计时精度分毫不差，亚运会的科技含量越来越高。”杭州富阳水上运动中心运行团队秘书长沈晓亮说，从1990年北京亚运会到2010年广州亚运会，再到这次的杭州亚运会，时光流转，见证我国综合国力持续跃升，经济社会发展突飞猛进。

;

;在杭州拱墅区文晖街道现代城社区，很多居民观看了开幕式电视直播。“我们感到非常激动和自豪。”社区干部邵莉静说，“终于在家门口迎来了亚运盛会，作为市民，我们很荣幸能够见证这一时刻，并且参与其中。”从亚运志愿服务岗亭到一幅幅亚运墙绘，再到特色观赛空间，街道里处处洋溢着亚运气息。

;

;杭州亚运会筹办历程，再一次彰显了社会主义集中力量办大事的制度优势。

;

;国网浙江电力董事长、党委书记陈安伟表示，国网浙江电力1.8万余名保电人员坚守岗位，恪尽职守，努力保障亚运期间电力安全可靠供应，助力打造首届碳中和亚运会。

;

; ; 亚洲运动会承载着亚洲人民对和平、团结、包容的美好向往;

;

;作为党的二十大胜利召开后我国举办的规模最大、水平最高的国际综合性体育赛事，杭州亚运会备受瞩目。

;

;“杭州亚运会开幕式对于灯光的艺术性运用尤其让我印象深刻。”来自沙特阿拉伯的记者阿巴迪·亚古布表示，杭州亚运会开幕式将中国传统文化和现代科技相结合，展现了独具特色的中国历史建筑和江南风景，自己在享受视觉盛宴的同时进一步加深了对中国传统文化的理解。

;

;亚洲运动会承载着亚洲人民对和平、团结、包容的美好向往。杭州亚运会“心心相融，爱达未来”的口号与“更快、更高、更强——更团结”的奥林匹克格言高度契合，寄托着美好愿望。

;

;开幕式“潮起亚细亚”的主题给人们留下深刻印象。杭州亚运会开幕式总撰稿冷凇介绍，水是文明的源泉，杭州是一个因水而生、因水而兴的城市，开幕式以“潮”为题眼，以“水”来串联，用“潮”的澎湃向上，展现可信、可爱、可敬的中国形象，展现新时代中国与亚洲和世界的交融激荡。

;

;中央音乐学院教授袁莎和来自浙江小百花越剧院的90后演员汪舟格参与了开幕式《国风雅韵》文艺演出。袁莎表示：“希望我演奏的古筝乐曲，能让亚洲乃至世界人民感受到中华优秀传统文化的魅力。”汪舟格说：“有幸参与这次亚运盛会，是越剧演员从艺的骄傲，让我们充满文化自信。”

;

;行走在杭州大街小巷，随处可见的亚运会吉祥物“江南忆”备受欢迎，中外游客争相购买纪念品、与之合影留念。亚运会吉祥物的主设计师、中国美术学院教师张文说：“希望通过吉祥物表达我们最美好的愿望，为这座城市留下美好的文化记忆。”

;

;亚运会为体育和文化交相辉映提供了舞台，是亚洲文化兼收并蓄、博采众长、充满活力的生动写照。来自良渚古城遗址的“文明之光”，点燃象征亚洲大团结的体育之火，源远流长的中华文明与激情洋溢的体育盛会交相辉映。

;

;开幕式上，游泳运动员、奥运冠军汪顺作为最后一棒火炬手，与“数字火炬手”一道点燃“钱江潮涌”主火炬塔，亚运之火熊熊燃烧。那一刻他心潮澎湃，久久难平。汪顺说：“亚运会不仅是竞技的舞台，更是促进和平、团结、包容的重要平台。在比赛中，我们同各代表团选手既比拼实力，也增进友谊。”

;

;来自浙江师范大学的志愿者张紫晶说，十分荣幸能够以“小青荷”的身份参与这次亚运盛会。“在已经开赛的足球赛场，观众的热情很高，运动员激情澎湃。运动员进球后，向观众席的球迷问好，还向大家鞠躬、招手，我们也向运动员招手。大家友好互动，其乐融融，让我感受到亚运会大家庭的文化交融和真诚友谊。”

;

; ; 以“使命在肩、奋斗有我”的责任担当，顽强拼搏、超越自我、为国争光;

;

;作为亚洲地区规模最大的综合性体育运动会，亚运会激扬体育精神、展现亚洲风采、促进友谊团结，不断提升亚洲地区的竞技体育水平。本届亚运会报名规模、项目数量均创历史新高，彰显了亚洲人民对杭州亚运会的热切期盼和坚定支持。

;

;亚运会是体育竞技的舞台，是体育健儿拼搏奋斗、突破自我的平台。

;

;乒乓球运动员、奥运冠军孙颖莎在开幕式上作为运动员代表之一宣誓，她感到无比激动。“出生在这样一个伟大的国家，成长在一个最好的时代，我感到很自豪。”孙颖莎说，“我们要在比赛中大力弘扬奥林匹克精神和中华体育精神，为祖国和人民贡献青春和力量。”

;

;在9月24日结束的赛艇女子轻量级双人双桨决赛中，中国体育代表团的邹佳琪、邱秀萍搭档以绝对领先优势夺冠，摘得本届亚运会首块金牌，赢得“开门红”。赛后，两名年轻运动员激动不已。邹佳琪说：“我们站上赛场，每一场比赛都会全力以赴、顽强拼搏，努力赛出佳绩，为祖国争光、为人生添彩。”邱秀萍说：“这次夺冠进一步激发了我们的信心。未来我们要更加刻苦训练、脚踏实地，在竞技场上展现新一代中国青年的精神风貌。”

;

;国家体育总局举重摔跤柔道运动管理中心党委书记毕东海表示，中国举重队刚刚结束举重世锦赛的征程，就踏上亚运会赛场，在如此短时间内连续参加重要赛事对中国举重队是第一次。“队员们需要连续控降体重、恢复体能、预防伤病，我们一定保持高昂斗志、刻苦训练，在亚运赛场挑战新的极限。”

;

;中国攀岩队领队王云龙表示：“队员们将在速度项目上全力拼搏，争取实现新突破。同时，我们将和各参赛队伍在友好交流中增进了解，汇聚更多体育发展正能量。”

;

;出生于浙江杭州的网球运动员吴易昺是第二次参加亚运会，将参加本届亚运会男单和男双比赛的角逐。“回到家乡参赛，我非常自豪。虽然有压力，但我会充分享受这次比赛，希望大家都能在杭州留下美好的记忆。”吴易昺说，“我们这一代青年人肩负光荣使命。有目标就敢闯，有梦想就去追，作为青年运动员，我们一定在亚运舞台展现出最好的自己，为祖国争取更多荣誉。”

;

;本届亚运会开赛以来，中国队运动员挥洒汗水，为实现“运动成绩和精神文明双丰收”的目标努力奋进。以“使命在肩、奋斗有我”的责任担当，顽强拼搏、超越自我、为国争光，定能向世界展现中国式现代化体育实践的强大力量，为亚洲和国际奥林匹克运动发展作出新贡献。

;

;（本报记者马剑、江南、窦皓、窦瀚洋、赵梦阳、李硕、孙龙飞、李欣怡、郑轶、李洋）
